stepAnswer: combines other Power Tools with other features to find and visualize data, share, and collaborate
stepTitle: What does the Power BI do?
choices: combines other Power Tools with other features to find and visualize data, share, and collaborate
combines other Power Tools with other features to find and visualize data, share, and collaborate
creates an interactive visualization tool used to provide a $$drag-and-drop$$ interface for rapid model building
